meanings.sent1: The antistudent behavior of the bully made school unpleasant for many.
meanings.sent2: Her antistudent attitude was evident in her refusal to participate in class activities.
meanings.sent3: The antistudent squirrel kept stealing pencils from the students' desks.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds looming over the school seemed to have an antistudent presence.
meanings.sent5: The teacher warned the class about the antistudent group causing trouble on campus.

meanings.definition: A person or group that is against students or education.
meanings.sent1: The principal had to deal with an antistudent who was spreading rumors about the school.
meanings.sent2: The antistudent protested outside the school, claiming education was a waste of time.
meanings.sent3: The antistudent group tried to ban homework as their main mission.
meanings.sent4: The shadowy figure lurking near the school gates seemed like an antistudent.
meanings.sent5: The antistudent's graffiti on the school walls caused quite a stir among the students.
